TTOverdrive Class Reference

TTOverdrive is an audio processor that provides a soft saturation or overdrive effect to "warm" a sound up. More...

TTFloat64 attrPreamp

Detailed Description

TTOverdrive is an audio processor that provides a soft saturation or overdrive effect to "warm" a sound up.
